Series.Actors: |Katharine McPhee|Jack Davenport|Debra Messing|Krysta Rodriguez|Jennifer Hudson|Jeremy Jordan|Andy Mientus|Leslie Odom Jr.|Anjelica Huston|Megan Hilty|Christian Borle|
Series.Overview: Smash is a musical drama that celebrates the beauty and heartbreak of the Broadway theater as it follows a cross-section of dreamers and schemers who all have one common desire - to be a Smash¬ù
